title: ‘The Pain Is 11 out of 10’: Chloé Dygert Stuns with Defiant Silver Medal at World Championships
content:
American Chloé Dygert lands runner-up slot at cycling's world road championships Saturday, putting in a stubborn, spirited performance.

Read the full article at ‘The Pain Is 11 out of 10’: Chloé Dygert Stuns with Defiant Silver Medal at World Championships on Velo.
author: sstokes
